original_title: Dilip Fonseka of Ceylon Pharma College wins ‘Revolutionary Thinker’ Award
original_body_lines: Dilip Fonseka, the founder of Ceylon Pharma College, received the “Revolutionary Thinker in Pharmacy and Education” award at Asia’s Icon Awards for his groundbreaking contributions to pharmaceutical education. Established in 2020, the college has grown from 10 to over 3,000 students in four years. It offers comprehensive courses like the Advanced and Certificate Courses in Pharmacy Practice, catering to aspiring pharmacists, healthcare professionals, and those planning to work abroad. The college features a Digital Pharmacy portal for practical learning and offers flexible online and in-person study options. Ceylon Pharma College has previously won several prestigious awards for its educational excellence.
